title: Women's March on Washington: Articulate inclusivity for trans women and transfeminine folk
text:
by: SGH, Lane target: Women's March on Washington 
According to a Facebook comment made by an organizer of the Women's March on Washington, trans women are "welcome" to the march but not welcome to use women's bathrooms. Although it is unclear to what bathrooms the organizer was referring, the March organizers have refused to explain this comment and consistently deleted—or left unpublished—requests for clarification.The Women's March on Washington is not truly inclusive if it does not include all women. We call on the March organizers to clearly articulate a policy of conceptual and material inclusivity towards trans women and transfeminine people. read petition letter ▾ 
Dear WMW Organizers, 
According to a Facebook comment made by an organizer of the Women's March on Washington, trans women are "welcome" to the march but not welcome to use women's bathrooms. Although it is unclear to what bathrooms the organizer was referring, the March organizers have refused to explain this comment and consistently deleted—or left unpublished—requests for clarification.The Women's March on Washington is not truly inclusive if it does not include all women. We call on the March organizers to clearly articulate a policy of conceptual and material inclusivity towards trans women and transfeminine people. 
Thank you,
